org.apache.poi.sl.draw

Class SLGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • org.apache.poi.sl.draw.SLGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SLGraphics
extends java.awt.Graphics2D
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Translates Graphics2D calls into PowerPoint.(将Graphics2D调用转换为PowerPoint。)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SLGraphics(GroupShape<?,?> group)
      Construct Java Graphics object which translates graphic calls in ppt drawing layer.(构造Java Graphics对象，用于在ppt绘图层中转换图形调用。)

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Shape shape)
        Strokes the outline of a Shape using the settings of the current Graphics2D context. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, Paint, Composite and Stroke attributes.(使用当前Graphics 2D上下文的设置来抚摸Shape的轮廓。应用的渲染属性包括剪辑、变换、绘制、合成和笔画属性。)
        Specified by:
        draw in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中绘制)
        Parameters:
        shape - the Shape to be rendered(形状-要渲染的形状)
        See Also:
        setStroke(java.awt.Stroke), setPaint(java.awt.Paint), Graphics.setColor(java.awt.Color), _transform, setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), clip(java.awt.Shape), setClip(java.awt.Shape), setComposite(java.awt.Composite)

      • drawString

        public void drawString(java.lang.String s,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Renders the text specified by the specified String, using the current text attribute state in the Graphics2D context. The baseline of the first character is at position (x, y) in the User Space. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, Paint, Font and Composite attributes. For characters in script systems such as Hebrew and Arabic, the glyphs can be rendered from right to left, in which case the coordinate supplied is the location of the leftmost character on the baseline.(使用Graphics2D上下文中的当前text属性状态呈现由指定String指定的文本。第一个字符的基线位于用户空间中的位置（x，y）。应用的渲染属性包括剪辑、变换、绘制、字体和合成属性。对于希伯来语和阿拉伯语等脚本系统中的字符，字形可以从右到左渲染，在这种情况下，提供的坐标是基线上最左侧字符的位置。)
        Specified by:
        drawString in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的draw字符串)
        Parameters:
        s - the String to be rendered(s -要呈现的字符串)
        x - the x coordinate of the location where the String should be rendered(x -应该渲染字符串的位置的x坐标)
        y - the y coordinate of the location where the String should be rendered(y -应该渲染字符串的位置的y坐标)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if str is null(java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果字符串为空)
        See Also:
        setPaint(java.awt.Paint), Graphics.setColor(java.awt.Color), Graphics.setFont(java.awt.Font), setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), setComposite(java.awt.Composite), setClip(java.awt.Shape)

      • fill

        public void fill(java.awt.Shape shape)
        Fills the interior of a Shape using the settings of the Graphics2D context. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, Paint, and Composite.(使用Graphics 2D上下文的设置填充Shape的内部。应用的渲染属性包括“剪辑”、“变换”、“绘制”和“合成”。)
        Specified by:
        fill in class java.awt.Graphics2D(填写类java.awt.Graphics2D)
        Parameters:

      • translate

        public void translate(int x,
                      int y)
        Translates the origin of the graphics context to the point (x, y) in the current coordinate system. Modifies this graphics context so that its new origin corresponds to the point (x, y) in this graphics context's original coordinate system. All coordinates used in subsequent rendering operations on this graphics context will be relative to this new origin.(将图形上下文的原点转换为当前坐标系中的点（x，y）。修改此图形上下文，使其新原点对应于此图形上下文原始坐标系中的点（x，y）。在此图形上下文上的后续渲染操作中使用的所有坐标都将相对于此新原点。)
        Specified by:
        translate in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中翻译)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate.(x -x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate.(y -y坐标。)

      • clip

        @NotImplemented
public void clip(java.awt.Shape s)
        Intersects the current Clip with the interior of the specified Shape and sets the Clip to the resulting intersection. The specified Shape is transformed with the current Graphics2D Transform before being intersected with the current Clip. This method is used to make the current Clip smaller. To make the Clip larger, use setClip. The user clip modified by this method is independent of the clipping associated with device bounds and visibility. If no clip has previously been set, or if the clip has been cleared using setClip with a null argument, the specified Shape becomes the new user clip.(将当前剪辑与指定Shape的内部相交，并将剪辑设置为结果相交。指定的形状在使用当前剪辑重新加载之前先使用当前的图形2D变换进行变换。此方法用于使当前剪辑变小。要使剪辑更大，请使用set剪辑。通过此方法修改的用户剪辑独立于与设备边界和可见性相关的剪辑。如果之前未设置任何剪辑，或者如果已使用带空参数的setShape清除该剪辑，则指定的Shape将成为新的用户剪辑。)
        Specified by:
        clip in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的剪辑)
        Parameters:
        s - the Shape to be intersected with the current Clip. If s is null, this method clears the current Clip.(s -要与当前剪辑同步的形状。如果s为空，此方法将清除当前剪辑。)

      • getClip

        @NotImplemented
public java.awt.Shape getClip()
        Gets the current clipping area. This method returns the user clip, which is independent of the clipping associated with device bounds and window visibility. If no clip has previously been set, or if the clip has been cleared using setClip(null), this method returns null.(获取当前剪辑区域。此方法返回用户剪辑，该剪辑独立于与设备边界和窗口可见性相关的剪辑。如果之前没有设置剪辑，或者如果已使用setShape（空）清除剪辑，则此方法返回空。)
        Specified by:
        getClip in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的get剪辑)
        Returns:
        a Shape object representing the current clipping area, or null if no clip is set.(表示当前剪辑区域的Shape对象，如果未设置剪辑，则为空。)
        Since:

        See Also:

      • scale

        public void scale(double sx,
                  double sy)
        Concatenates the current Graphics2D Transform with a scaling transformation Subsequent rendering is resized according to the specified scaling factors relative to the previous scaling. This is equivalent to calling transform(S), where S is an AffineTransform represented by the following matrix: 
                  [   sx   0    0   ]
          [   0    sy   0   ]
          [   0    0    1   ]
        (将当前的Graphics 2D变换与缩放变换相连后续渲染将根据相对于先前缩放的指定缩放因子调整大小。这相当于调用transform（S），其中S是由以下矩阵表示的AffineChange： [ SX 0 0 ] [ 0 sy 0 ] [ 0 0 1 ])
        Specified by:
        scale in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的缩放)
        Parameters:
        sx - the amount by which X coordinates in subsequent rendering operations are multiplied relative to previous rendering operations.(sx -后续渲染操作中的X坐标相对于之前渲染操作所乘以的量。)
        sy - the amount by which Y coordinates in subsequent rendering operations are multiplied relative to previous rendering operations.(sy -后续渲染操作中的Y坐标相对于之前渲染操作所乘以的量。)

      • fillArc

        public void fillArc(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    int startAngle,
                    int arcAngle)
        Fills a circular or elliptical arc covering the specified rectangle.

        The resulting arc begins at startAngle and extends for arcAngle degrees. Angles are interpreted such that 0 degrees is at the 3 o'clock position. A positive value indicates a counter-clockwise rotation while a negative value indicates a clockwise rotation.

        The center of the arc is the center of the rectangle whose origin is (x, y) and whose size is specified by the width and height arguments.

        The resulting arc covers an area width + 1 pixels wide by height + 1 pixels tall.

        The angles are specified relative to the non-square extents of the bounding rectangle such that 45 degrees always falls on the line from the center of the ellipse to the upper right corner of the bounding rectangle. As a result, if the bounding rectangle is noticeably longer in one axis than the other, the angles to the start and end of the arc segment will be skewed farther along the longer axis of the bounds.

        (填充覆盖指定矩形的圆形或椭圆形弧线。生成的弧线从startAngle开始并延伸arcAngle度数。角度解释为0度位于3点钟位置。正值表示逆时针旋转，负值表示顺时针旋转。弧线的中心是原点为（x，y）且大小由宽度和高度参数指定的矩形的中心。生成的弧线覆盖宽度+ 1像素宽x高度+ 1像素高的区域。角度是相对于边界矩形的非方形范围指定的，以便45度始终落在从椭圆中心到边界矩形右上角的直线上。因此，如果边界矩形在一个轴上明显比另一个轴长，则弧形段起点和终点的角度将沿着边界的长轴倾斜得更远。)
        Specified by:
        fillArc in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的fillArc)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc to be filled.(x -要填充的弧线左上角的x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc to be filled.(y -要填充的弧线左上角的y坐标。)
        width - the width of the arc to be filled.(宽度-要填充的弧线的宽度。)
        height - the height of the arc to be filled.(高度-待填充的弧线的高度。)
        startAngle - the beginning angle.(startAngle -开始角度。)
        arcAngle - the angular extent of the arc, relative to the start angle.(arcAngle -弧线相对于起点角的角度范围。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.drawArc(int, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawArc

        public void drawArc(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    int startAngle,
                    int arcAngle)
        Draws the outline of a circular or elliptical arc covering the specified rectangle.

        The resulting arc begins at startAngle and extends for arcAngle degrees, using the current color. Angles are interpreted such that 0 degrees is at the 3 o'clock position. A positive value indicates a counter-clockwise rotation while a negative value indicates a clockwise rotation.

        The center of the arc is the center of the rectangle whose origin is (x, y) and whose size is specified by the width and height arguments.

        The resulting arc covers an area width + 1 pixels wide by height + 1 pixels tall.

        The angles are specified relative to the non-square extents of the bounding rectangle such that 45 degrees always falls on the line from the center of the ellipse to the upper right corner of the bounding rectangle. As a result, if the bounding rectangle is noticeably longer in one axis than the other, the angles to the start and end of the arc segment will be skewed farther along the longer axis of the bounds.

        (绘制覆盖指定矩形的圆形或椭圆形弧线的轮廓。生成的弧线从startAngle开始，并使用当前颜色延伸arcAngle度数。角度解释为0度位于3点钟位置。正值表示逆时针旋转，负值表示顺时针旋转。弧线的中心是原点为（x，y）且大小由宽度和高度参数指定的矩形的中心。生成的弧线覆盖宽度+ 1像素宽x高度+ 1像素高的区域。角度是相对于边界矩形的非方形范围指定的，以便45度始终落在从椭圆中心到边界矩形右上角的直线上。因此，如果边界矩形在一个轴上明显比另一个轴长，则弧形段起点和终点的角度将沿着边界的长轴倾斜得更远。)
        Specified by:
        drawArc in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的drawArc)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc to be drawn.(x -要绘制的弧线左上角的x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc to be drawn.(y -要绘制的弧线左上角的y坐标。)
        width - the width of the arc to be drawn.(宽度-要绘制的弧线的宽度。)
        height - the height of the arc to be drawn.(高度-要绘制的弧线的高度。)
        startAngle - the beginning angle.(startAngle -开始角度。)
        arcAngle - the angular extent of the arc, relative to the start angle.(arcAngle -弧线相对于起点角的角度范围。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.fillArc(int, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         java.awt.Color bgcolor,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified image as is currently available. The image is drawn with its top-left corner at (x, y) in this graphics context's coordinate space. Transparent pixels are drawn in the specified background color.

        This operation is equivalent to filling a rectangle of the width and height of the specified image with the given color and then drawing the image on top of it, but possibly more efficient.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the complete image has not yet been loaded, and it has not been dithered and converted for the current output device.

        If the image has not yet been completely loaded, then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that draws the image notifies the specified image observer.

        (绘制当前可用的尽可能多的指定图像。在此图形上下文的坐标空间中，图像的左上角位于（x，y）处。透明像素以指定的背景色绘制。这个操作相当于用给定的颜色填充一个宽度和高度与指定图像相同的矩形，然后在其上绘制图像，但可能更有效。在所有情况下，即使完整图像尚未加载，并且尚未针对当前输出设备进行抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果图像尚未完全加载，则drawImage返回假。随着更多图像可用，绘制图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn.(IMG -要绘制的指定图像。)
        x - the x coordinate.(x -x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate.(y -y坐标。)
        bgcolor - the background color to paint under the non-opaque portions of the image.(bgColor -在图像的非不透明部分下绘制的背景色。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is converted.(观察者-随着更多图像被转换而通知的对象。)
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         int width,
                                         int height,
                                         java.awt.Color bgcolor,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified image as has already been scaled to fit inside the specified rectangle.

        The image is drawn inside the specified rectangle of this graphics context's coordinate space, and is scaled if necessary. Transparent pixels are drawn in the specified background color. This operation is equivalent to filling a rectangle of the width and height of the specified image with the given color and then drawing the image on top of it, but possibly more efficient.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the entire image has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that draws the image notifies the specified image observer.

        A scaled version of an image will not necessarily be available immediately just because an unscaled version of the image has been constructed for this output device. Each size of the image may be cached separately and generated from the original data in a separate image production sequence.

        (绘制已缩放的指定图像以适应指定矩形的大小。图像会在此图形上下文坐标空间的指定矩形内绘制，并根据需要进行缩放。透明像素以指定的背景色绘制。这个操作相当于用给定的颜色填充一个宽度和高度与指定图像相同的矩形，然后在其上绘制图像，但可能更有效。在所有情况下，即使整个图像尚未针对当前输出设备进行缩放、抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则drawImage返回假。随着更多图像可用，绘制图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。图像的缩放版本不一定仅仅因为已为此输出设备构建了图像的未缩放版本而立即可用。每个尺寸的图像可以单独缓存并在单独的图像制作序列中从原始数据生成。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn.(IMG -要绘制的指定图像。)
        x - the x coordinate.(x -x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate.(y -y坐标。)
        width - the width of the rectangle.(宽度-矩形的宽度。)
        height - the height of the rectangle.(高度-矩形的高度。)
        bgcolor - the background color to paint under the non-opaque portions of the image.(bgColor -在图像的非不透明部分下绘制的背景色。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is converted.(观察者-随着更多图像被转换而通知的对象。)
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int dx1,
                                         int dy1,
                                         int dx2,
                                         int dy2,
                                         int sx1,
                                         int sy1,
                                         int sx2,
                                         int sy2,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified area of the specified image as is currently available, scaling it on the fly to fit inside the specified area of the destination drawable surface. Transparent pixels do not affect whatever pixels are already there.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the image area to be drawn has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that draws the image notifies the specified image observer.

        This method always uses the unscaled version of the image to render the scaled rectangle and performs the required scaling on the fly. It does not use a cached, scaled version of the image for this operation. Scaling of the image from source to destination is performed such that the first coordinate of the source rectangle is mapped to the first coordinate of the destination rectangle, and the second source coordinate is mapped to the second destination coordinate. The subimage is scaled and flipped as needed to preserve those mappings.

        (绘制指定图像的指定区域的当前可用部分，并动态缩放该区域以适合目标可绘制图面的指定区域。透明像素不会影响已经存在的任何像素。在所有情况下，即使要绘制的图像区域尚未针对当前输出设备进行缩放、抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则drawImage返回假。随着更多图像可用，绘制图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。此方法始终使用图像的未缩放版本来渲染缩放的矩形，并动态执行所需的缩放。它不会使用图像的缓存、缩放版本来进行此操作。执行图像从源到目的地的缩放，使得源矩形的第一坐标被映射到目的地矩形的第一坐标，并且第二源坐标被映射到第二目的地坐标。根据需要缩放和翻转子图像以保留这些映射。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn(IMG -要绘制的指定图像)
        dx1 - the x coordinate of the first corner of the destination rectangle.(Dx 1-目标矩形第一个角的x坐标。)
        dy1 - the y coordinate of the first corner of the destination rectangle.(dy 1-目标矩形第一个角的y坐标。)
        dx2 - the x coordinate of the second corner of the destination rectangle.(Dx 2-目标矩形第二个角的x坐标。)
        dy2 - the y coordinate of the second corner of the destination rectangle.(dy 2-目标矩形第二个角的y坐标。)
        sx1 - the x coordinate of the first corner of the source rectangle.(sx 1-源矩形第一个角的x坐标。)
        sy1 - the y coordinate of the first corner of the source rectangle.(sy 1-源矩形第一个角的y坐标。)
        sx2 - the x coordinate of the second corner of the source rectangle.(sx 2-源矩形第二个角的x坐标。)
        sy2 - the y coordinate of the second corner of the source rectangle.(sy 2-源矩形第二个角的y坐标。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is scaled and converted.(观察者-随着图像的更多部分被缩放和转换，将收到通知的对象。)
        Since:
        JDK1.1
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int dx1,
                                         int dy1,
                                         int dx2,
                                         int dy2,
                                         int sx1,
                                         int sy1,
                                         int sx2,
                                         int sy2,
                                         java.awt.Color bgcolor,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified area of the specified image as is currently available, scaling it on the fly to fit inside the specified area of the destination drawable surface.

        Transparent pixels are drawn in the specified background color. This operation is equivalent to filling a rectangle of the width and height of the specified image with the given color and then drawing the image on top of it, but possibly more efficient.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the image area to be drawn has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that draws the image notifies the specified image observer.

        This method always uses the unscaled version of the image to render the scaled rectangle and performs the required scaling on the fly. It does not use a cached, scaled version of the image for this operation. Scaling of the image from source to destination is performed such that the first coordinate of the source rectangle is mapped to the first coordinate of the destination rectangle, and the second source coordinate is mapped to the second destination coordinate. The subimage is scaled and flipped as needed to preserve those mappings.

        (绘制指定图像的指定区域的当前可用部分，并动态缩放该区域以适合目标可绘制图面的指定区域。透明像素以指定的背景色绘制。这个操作相当于用给定的颜色填充一个宽度和高度与指定图像相同的矩形，然后在其上绘制图像，但可能更有效。在所有情况下，即使要绘制的图像区域尚未针对当前输出设备进行缩放、抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则drawImage返回假。随着更多图像可用，绘制图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。此方法始终使用图像的未缩放版本来渲染缩放的矩形，并动态执行所需的缩放。它不会使用图像的缓存、缩放版本来进行此操作。执行图像从源到目的地的缩放，使得源矩形的第一坐标被映射到目的地矩形的第一坐标，并且第二源坐标被映射到第二目的地坐标。根据需要缩放和翻转子图像以保留这些映射。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn(IMG -要绘制的指定图像)
        dx1 - the x coordinate of the first corner of the destination rectangle.(Dx 1-目标矩形第一个角的x坐标。)
        dy1 - the y coordinate of the first corner of the destination rectangle.(dy 1-目标矩形第一个角的y坐标。)
        dx2 - the x coordinate of the second corner of the destination rectangle.(Dx 2-目标矩形第二个角的x坐标。)
        dy2 - the y coordinate of the second corner of the destination rectangle.(dy 2-目标矩形第二个角的y坐标。)
        sx1 - the x coordinate of the first corner of the source rectangle.(sx 1-源矩形第一个角的x坐标。)
        sy1 - the y coordinate of the first corner of the source rectangle.(sy 1-源矩形第一个角的y坐标。)
        sx2 - the x coordinate of the second corner of the source rectangle.(sx 2-源矩形第二个角的x坐标。)
        sy2 - the y coordinate of the second corner of the source rectangle.(sy 2-源矩形第二个角的y坐标。)
        bgcolor - the background color to paint under the non-opaque portions of the image.(bgColor -在图像的非不透明部分下绘制的背景色。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is scaled and converted.(观察者-随着图像的更多部分被缩放和转换，将收到通知的对象。)
        Since:
        JDK1.1
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified image as is currently available. The image is drawn with its top-left corner at (x, y) in this graphics context's coordinate space. Transparent pixels in the image do not affect whatever pixels are already there.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the complete image has not yet been loaded, and it has not been dithered and converted for the current output device.

        If the image has completely loaded and its pixels are no longer being changed, then drawImage returns true. Otherwise, drawImage returns false and as more of the image becomes available or it is time to draw another frame of animation, the process that loads the image notifies the specified image observer.

        (绘制当前可用的尽可能多的指定图像。在此图形上下文的坐标空间中，图像的左上角位于（x，y）处。图像中的透明像素不会影响已经存在的任何像素。在所有情况下，即使完整图像尚未加载，并且尚未针对当前输出设备进行抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果图像已完全加载并且其像素不再更改，则drawImage返回true。否则，drawImage将返回假，并且随着更多图像变得可用或是时候绘制另一帧动画时，加载图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn. This method does nothing if img is null.(IMG -要绘制的指定图像。如果IMG为空，此方法不执行任何操作。)
        x - the x coordinate.(x -x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate.(y -y坐标。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is converted.(观察者-随着更多图像被转换而通知的对象。)
        Returns:
        false if the image pixels are still changing; true otherwise.(如果图像像素仍在变化，则为假;否则为真。)
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of this graphics context and releases any system resources that it is using. A Graphics object cannot be used after disposehas been called.

        When a Java program runs, a large number of Graphics objects can be created within a short time frame. Although the finalization process of the garbage collector also disposes of the same system resources, it is preferable to manually free the associated resources by calling this method rather than to rely on a finalization process which may not run to completion for a long period of time.

        Graphics objects which are provided as arguments to the paint and update methods of components are automatically released by the system when those methods return. For efficiency, programmers should call dispose when finished using a Graphics object only if it was created directly from a component or another Graphics object.

        (处理此图形上下文并释放其正在使用的任何系统资源。调用disposse后无法使用图形对象。当Java程序运行时，可以在短时间内创建大量的图形对象。尽管垃圾收集器的最终化进程也处理了相同的系统资源，但最好通过调用该方法手动释放关联资源，而不是依赖可能长时间运行完成的最终化进程。作为组件的绘制和更新方法参数提供的图形对象在这些方法返回时会自动释放。为了提高效率，只有当图形对象是直接从组件或另一个图形对象创建的时，程序员才应在使用完图形对象后调用dispose。)
        Specified by:
        dispose in class java.awt.Graphics(在类java.awt.GMA中处置)
        See Also:
        Graphics.finalize(), Component.paint(java.awt.Graphics), Component.update(java.awt.Graphics), Component.getGraphics(), Graphics.create()

      • fillPolygon

        public void fillPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints,
                        int nPoints)
        Fills a closed polygon defined by arrays of x and y coordinates.

        This method draws the polygon defined by nPoint line segments, where the first nPoint - 1 line segments are line segments from (xPoints[i - 1], yPoints[i - 1]) to (xPoints[i], yPoints[i]), for 1 ≤ i ≤ nPoints. The figure is automatically closed by drawing a line connecting the final point to the first point, if those points are different.

        The area inside the polygon is defined using an even-odd fill rule, also known as the alternating rule.

        (填充由x和y坐标数组定义的封闭多边形。此方法绘制由nPoint直线段定义的多边形，其中前一个nPoint - 1直线段是从（xPoints[i - 1]，yPoints[i - 1]）到（xPoints[i]，yPoints[i]）的直线段，对于1 ' i '。如果这些点不同，则通过绘制连接最终点和第一点的线来自动关闭图形。多边形内部的区域使用偶数-奇数填充规则（也称为交替规则）来定义。)
        Specified by:
        fillPolygon in class java.awt.Graphics(fillPolygon在java.awt.GMA类中)
        Parameters:
        xPoints - a an array of x coordinates.(xPoints -x坐标数组。)
        yPoints - a an array of y coordinates.(yPoints -y坐标数组。)
        nPoints - a the total number of points.(nPoints - a积分总数。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.drawPolygon(int[], int[], int)

      • fillRect

        public void fillRect(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        Fills the specified rectangle. The left and right edges of the rectangle are at x and x + width - 1. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height - 1. The resulting rectangle covers an area width pixels wide by height pixels tall. The rectangle is filled using the graphics context's current color.(填充指定的矩形。矩形的左边缘和右边缘位于x和x + width - 1处。顶部和底部边缘位于y和y + height - 1处。生成的矩形覆盖一个区域，宽度为像素宽，高度为像素高。使用图形上下文的当前颜色填充矩形。)
        Specified by:
        fillRect in class java.awt.Graphics(fillRect在类java.awt.GMA中)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the rectangle to be filled.(要填充的矩形的x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate of the rectangle to be filled.(y -要填充的矩形的y坐标。)
        width - the width of the rectangle to be filled.(宽度-要填充的矩形的宽度。)
        height - the height of the rectangle to be filled.(高度-要填充的矩形的高度。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.clearRect(int, int, int, int), Graphics.drawRect(int, int, int, int)

      • drawPolygon

        public void drawPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints,
                        int nPoints)
        Draws a closed polygon defined by arrays of x and y coordinates. Each pair of (x, y) coordinates defines a point.

        This method draws the polygon defined by nPoint line segments, where the first nPoint - 1 line segments are line segments from (xPoints[i - 1], yPoints[i - 1]) to (xPoints[i], yPoints[i]), for 1 ≤ i ≤ nPoints. The figure is automatically closed by drawing a line connecting the final point to the first point, if those points are different.

        (绘制由x和y坐标数组定义的封闭多边形。每对（x，y）坐标定义一个点。此方法绘制由nPoint直线段定义的多边形，其中前一个nPoint - 1直线段是从（xPoints[i - 1]，yPoints[i - 1]）到（xPoints[i]，yPoints[i]）的直线段，对于1 ' i '。如果这些点不同，则通过绘制连接最终点和第一点的线来自动关闭图形。)
        Specified by:
        drawPolygon in class java.awt.Graphics(paw类中的多边形)
        Parameters:
        xPoints - a an array of x coordinates.(xPoints -x坐标数组。)
        yPoints - a an array of y coordinates.(yPoints -y坐标数组。)
        nPoints - a the total number of points.(nPoints - a积分总数。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.fillPolygon(int[],int[],int), Graphics.drawPolyline(int[], int[], int)

      • clipRect

        public void clipRect(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        Intersects the current clip with the specified rectangle. The resulting clipping area is the intersection of the current clipping area and the specified rectangle. If there is no current clipping area, either because the clip has never been set, or the clip has been cleared using setClip(null), the specified rectangle becomes the new clip. This method sets the user clip, which is independent of the clipping associated with device bounds and window visibility. This method can only be used to make the current clip smaller. To set the current clip larger, use any of the setClip methods. Rendering operations have no effect outside of the clipping area.(将当前剪辑与指定的矩形相交。生成的剪切区域是当前剪切区域和指定矩形的相交点。如果没有当前剪辑区域，要么是因为从未设置剪辑，要么是因为剪辑已使用setShape（空）清除，则指定的矩形将成为新剪辑。此方法设置用户剪辑，该剪辑独立于与设备边界和窗口可见性相关的剪辑。此方法只能用于使当前剪辑变小。要将当前剪辑设置得更大，请使用任何setShape方法。渲染操作在剪辑区域之外没有影响。)
        Specified by:
        clipRect in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.Graphics类中的clipRect)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the rectangle to intersect the clip with(x -与剪辑相交的矩形的x坐标)
        y - the y coordinate of the rectangle to intersect the clip with(y -与剪辑相交的矩形的y坐标)
        width - the width of the rectangle to intersect the clip with(宽度-与剪辑相交的矩形的宽度)
        height - the height of the rectangle to intersect the clip with(高度-与剪辑相交的矩形的高度)
        See Also:
        setClip(int, int, int, int), setClip(Shape)

      • setClip

        @NotImplemented
public void setClip(java.awt.Shape clip)
        Sets the current clipping area to an arbitrary clip shape. Not all objects that implement the Shape interface can be used to set the clip. The only Shape objects that are guaranteed to be supported are Shape objects that are obtained via the getClip method and via Rectangle objects. This method sets the user clip, which is independent of the clipping associated with device bounds and window visibility.(将当前剪辑区域设置为任意剪辑形状。并非所有实现Shape界面的对象都可以用于设置剪辑。唯一保证支持的Shape对象是通过getShape方法和Rectangle对象获得的Shape对象。此方法设置用户剪辑，该剪辑独立于与设备边界和窗口可见性相关的剪辑。)
        Specified by:
        setClip in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的setShape)
        Parameters:
        clip - the Shape to use to set the clip(clip -用于设置剪辑的形状)
        Since:

        See Also:
        Graphics.getClip(), Graphics.clipRect(int, int, int, int), Graphics.setClip(int, int, int, int)

      • getClipBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getClipBounds()
        Returns the bounding rectangle of the current clipping area. This method refers to the user clip, which is independent of the clipping associated with device bounds and window visibility. The coordinates in the rectangle are relative to the coordinate system origin of this graphics context.(返回当前剪切区域的边界矩形。此方法指的是用户剪辑，它独立于与设备边界和窗口可见性相关的剪辑。如果之前没有设置剪辑，或者如果已使用setShape（空）清除剪辑，则此方法返回空。矩形中的坐标相对于此图形上下文的坐标系原点。)

        (通过用当前绘图图面的背景色填充指定的矩形来清除该矩形。此操作不使用当前的绘制模式。从Java 1.1开始，屏幕外图像的背景颜色可能取决于系统。应用程序应使用setColor，然后使用fillRect，以确保屏幕外图像被清除为特定颜色。)

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double theta)
        Concatenates the current Graphics2D Transform with a rotation transform. Subsequent rendering is rotated by the specified radians relative to the previous origin. This is equivalent to calling transform(R), where R is an AffineTransform represented by the following matrix: 
                  [   cos(theta)    -sin(theta)    0   ]
          [   sin(theta)     cos(theta)    0   ]
          [       0              0         1   ]
        Rotating with a positive angle theta rotates points on the positive x axis toward the positive y axis.        (将当前的Graphics 2D变换与旋转变换相连。后续渲染将相对于前一原点旋转指定的弧度。这相当于调用transform（R），其中R是由以下矩阵表示的AffineChange： [ cos（theta） -sin（theta） 0 ] [ sin（theta） cos（theta） 0 ] [ 0 0 1 ] 以正角度旋转theta会将正x轴上的点朝向正y轴旋转。)
        Specified by:
        rotate in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中旋转)
        Parameters:
        theta - the angle of rotation in radians(theta -旋转角度，单位为弧度)

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double theta,
                   double x,
                   double y)
        Concatenates the current Graphics2D Transform with a translated rotation transform. Subsequent rendering is transformed by a transform which is constructed by translating to the specified location, rotating by the specified radians, and translating back by the same amount as the original translation. This is equivalent to the following sequence of calls: 
                  translate(x, y);
          rotate(theta);
          translate(-x, -y);
        Rotating with a positive angle theta rotates points on the positive x axis toward the positive y axis.        (将当前的Graphics 2D变换与翻译的旋转变换相关联。随后的渲染由变换进行变换，该变换是通过以下方式构建的：翻译到指定位置、旋转指定的弧度，然后翻译回与原始翻译相同的量。这相当于以下调用序列： translate（x，y）; 旋转（theta）; 翻译（-x，-y）; 以正角度旋转theta会将正x轴上的点朝向正y轴旋转。)
        Specified by:
        rotate in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中旋转)
        Parameters:
        theta - the angle of rotation in radians(theta -旋转角度，单位为弧度)
        x - x coordinate of the origin of the rotation(旋转原点的x - x坐标)
        y - y coordinate of the origin of the rotation(旋转原点的y - y坐标)

      • shear

        public void shear(double shx,
                  double shy)
        Concatenates the current Graphics2D Transform with a shearing transform. Subsequent renderings are sheared by the specified multiplier relative to the previous position. This is equivalent to calling transform(SH), where SH is an AffineTransform represented by the following matrix: 
                  [   1   shx   0   ]
          [  shy   1    0   ]
          [   0    0    1   ]
        (将当前Graphics2D变换与剪切变换连接起来。后续渲染将按照相对于前一位置的指定乘数进行剪切。这相当于调用变换（SH），其中SH是由以下矩阵表示的AffineChange： [ 1 SHX 0 ] [害羞 1 0 ] [ 0 0 1 ])
        Specified by:
        shear in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的剪切)
        Parameters:
        shx - the multiplier by which coordinates are shifted in the positive X axis direction as a function of their Y coordinate(shx -坐标在正X轴方向上移动的乘数，作为其Y坐标的函数)
        shy - the multiplier by which coordinates are shifted in the positive Y axis direction as a function of their X coordinate(shy -坐标作为X坐标的函数在Y轴正方向上移动的乘数)

      • getFontRenderContext

        public java.awt.font.FontRenderContext getFontRenderContext()
        Get the rendering context of the Font within this Graphics2D context. The FontRenderContext encapsulates application hints such as anti-aliasing and fractional metrics, as well as target device specific information such as dots-per-inch. This information should be provided by the application when using objects that perform typographical formatting, such as Font and TextLayout. This information should also be provided by applications that perform their own layout and need accurate measurements of various characteristics of glyphs such as advance and line height when various rendering hints have been applied to the text rendering.(获取该Graphics2D上下文中Font的渲染上下文。FontRenderContent封装了抗锯齿和分数指标等应用程序提示，以及目标设备特定信息，例如每英寸点数。当使用执行印刷格式化的对象（例如Font和TextLayout）时，应用程序应提供此信息。当各种渲染提示应用于文本渲染时，执行自己的布局并需要准确测量字形的各种特征（例如推进和线高度）的应用程序也应该提供此信息。)
        Specified by:
        getFontRenderContext in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的getFontRenderContent)
        Returns:
        a reference to an instance of FontRenderContext.(对FontRenderContent实例的引用。)
        Since:
        JDK1.2
        See Also:
        FontRenderContext, Font.createGlyphVector(FontRenderContext,char[]), TextLayout

      • transform

        public void transform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform Tx)
        Composes an AffineTransform object with the Transform in this Graphics2D according to the rule last-specified-first-applied. If the current Transform is Cx, the result of composition with Tx is a new Transform Cx'. Cx' becomes the current Transform for this Graphics2D. Transforming a point p by the updated Transform Cx' is equivalent to first transforming p by Tx and then transforming the result by the original Transform Cx. In other words, Cx'(p) = Cx(Tx(p)). A copy of the Tx is made, if necessary, so further modifications to Tx do not affect rendering.(根据最后指定-首先应用的规则，在此Graphics 2D中使用变换合成AffineShape对象。如果当前的变换是CX，则与Rx合成的结果是新的变换CX '。CX '成为此Graphics 2D的当前变换。通过更新后的变换CX '来变换点p相当于首先通过Rx变换p，然后通过原始变换CX来变换结果。换句话说，Cx ′（p）= Cx（Tx（p））。如有必要，将制作Tx的副本，因此对Tx的进一步修改不会影响渲染。)
        Specified by:
        transform in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的转换)
        Parameters:
        Tx - the AffineTransform object to be composed with the current Transform(Tx -要与当前Transform组合的AffineTransform对象)
        See Also:
        setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), AffineTransform

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the background color for the Graphics2D context. The background color is used for clearing a region. When a Graphics2D is constructed for a Component, the background color is inherited from the Component. Setting the background color in the Graphics2D context only affects the subsequent clearRect calls and not the background color of the Component. To change the background of the Component, use appropriate methods of the Component.(设置Graphics 2D上下文的背景色。背景色用于清除区域。当为组件构建Graphics 2D时，背景色将从组件继承。在Graphics 2D上下文中设置背景色只会影响后续的clearRect调用，而不会影响组件的背景色。要更改组件的背景，请使用组件的适当方法。)
        Specified by:
        setBackground in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中设置背景)
        Parameters:
        color - the background color that isused in subsequent calls to clearRect(颜色-在后续调用clearRect中使用的背景色)
        See Also:
        getBackground(), Graphics.clearRect(int, int, int, int)

      • setComposite

        @NotImplemented
public void setComposite(java.awt.Composite comp)
        Sets the Composite for the Graphics2D context. The Composite is used in all drawing methods such as drawImage, drawString, draw, and fill. It specifies how new pixels are to be combined with the existing pixels on the graphics device during the rendering process.

        If this Graphics2D context is drawing to a Component on the display screen and the Composite is a custom object rather than an instance of the AlphaComposite class, and if there is a security manager, its checkPermission method is called with an AWTPermission("readDisplayPixels") permission.

        (设置Graphics2D上下文的复合。Composite用于所有绘制方法，例如drawImage、drawLink、draw和fill。它指定在渲染过程中如何将新像素与图形设备上的现有像素组合。如果此Graphics2D上下文正在绘制到显示屏幕上的组件，并且Composite是自定义对象而不是AlphaComposite类的实例，并且如果有安全管理器，则使用AWTAPermit（“readDisplay Pixels”）权限来调用其checkPermit方法。)
        Specified by:
        setComposite in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的setComposite)
        Parameters:
        comp - the Composite object to be used for rendering(comp -用于渲染的Composite对象)
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if a custom Composite object is being used to render to the screen and a security manager is set and its checkPermission method does not allow the operation.(如果一个自定义的Composite对象被用于呈现到屏幕上，并且设置了一个安全管理器，并且它的checkPermission方法不允许该操作，则抛出SecurityException。)
        See Also:
        Graphics.setXORMode(java.awt.Color), Graphics.setPaintMode(), AlphaComposite

          [   0    0    1   ]
        (将当前的Graphics2D变换与翻译变换相连。后续渲染相对于前一位置平移指定的距离。这相当于调用transform（T），其中T是由以下矩阵表示的AffineChange： [ 1 0 TX ] [ 0 1 ty ] [ 0 0 1 ])

        @NotImplemented

                                       float x,
                                       float y)
        Renders the text of the specified iterator, using the Graphics2D context's current Paint. The iterator must specify a font for each character. The baseline of the first character is at position (x, y) in the User Space. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, Paint, and Composite attributes. For characters in script systems such as Hebrew and Arabic, the glyphs can be rendered from right to left, in which case the coordinate supplied is the location of the leftmost character on the baseline.(使用Graphics2D上下文的当前Paint呈现指定迭代器的文本。迭代器必须为每个字符指定字体。第一个字符的基线位于用户空间中的位置（x，y）。应用的渲染属性包括“剪辑”、“变换”、“绘制”和“合成”属性。对于希伯来语和阿拉伯语等脚本系统中的字符，字形可以从右到左渲染，在这种情况下，提供的坐标是基线上最左侧字符的位置。)
        Specified by:

      • hit

        public boolean hit(java.awt.Rectangle rect,
                   java.awt.Shape s,
                   boolean onStroke)
        Checks whether or not the specified Shape intersects the specified Rectangle, which is in device space. If onStroke is false, this method checks whether or not the interior of the specified Shape intersects the specified Rectangle. If onStroke is true, this method checks whether or not the Stroke of the specified Shape outline intersects the specified Rectangle. The rendering attributes taken into account include the Clip, Transform, and Stroke attributes.(检查指定的Shape是否与设备空间中的指定Rectangle相交。如果onStroke为false，则此方法检查指定Shape的内部是否与指定Rectangle相交。如果onStroke为true，则此方法检查指定Shape轮廓的Stroke是否与指定Rectangle相交。考虑的渲染属性包括“裁剪”、“变换”和“描边”属性。)
        Specified by:
        hit in class java.awt.Graphics2D(在java.awt.Graphics2D类中命中)
        Parameters:
        rect - the area in device space to check for a hit(rect -设备空间中用于检查命中的区域)
        s - the Shape to check for a hit(s -检查命中的形状)
        onStroke - flag used to choose between testing the stroked or the filled shape. If the flag is true, the Stroke oultine is tested. If the flag is false, the filled Shape is tested.(onStroke -用于在测试笔画形状或填充形状之间进行选择的标志。如果标志为真，则测试中风outine。如果标志为假，则测试填充的Shape。)
        Returns:
        true if there is a hit; false otherwise.(如果有命中，则为真;否则为假。)
        See Also:
        setStroke(java.awt.Stroke), fill(Shape), draw(Shape), _transform, setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), clip(java.awt.Shape), setClip(Shape)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         java.awt.geom.AffineTransform xform,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver obs)
        Renders an image, applying a transform from image space into user space before drawing. The transformation from user space into device space is done with the current Transform in the Graphics2D. The specified transformation is applied to the image before the transform attribute in the Graphics2D context is applied. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, and Composite attributes. Note that no rendering is done if the specified transform is noninvertible.(呈现图像，在绘制之前应用从图像空间到用户空间的转换。从用户空间到设备空间的转换是使用Graphics 2D中的当前Change完成的。在应用Graphics2D上下文中的变换属性之前，指定的变换将应用于图像。应用的渲染属性包括剪辑、变换和合成属性。请注意，如果指定的变换不可逆，则不会进行渲染。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the Image to be rendered(img -要渲染的图像)
        xform - the transformation from image space into user space(xform -从图像空间到用户空间的转换)
        obs - the ImageObserver to be notified as more of the Image is converted(obs -随着更多图像被转换，图像观察者将收到通知)
        Returns:
        true if the Image is fully loaded and completely rendered; false if the Image is still being loaded.(如果图像已完全加载并完全渲染，则为真;如果图像仍在加载，则为假。)
        See Also:
        _transform, setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), setComposite(java.awt.Composite), clip(java.awt.Shape), setClip(Shape)

      • drawImage

        @NotImplemented
public boolean drawImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         int width,
                                         int height,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        Draws as much of the specified image as has already been scaled to fit inside the specified rectangle.

        The image is drawn inside the specified rectangle of this graphics context's coordinate space, and is scaled if necessary. Transparent pixels do not affect whatever pixels are already there.

        This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the entire image has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete, then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that loads the image notifies the image observer by calling its imageUpdate method.

        A scaled version of an image will not necessarily be available immediately just because an unscaled version of the image has been constructed for this output device. Each size of the image may be cached separately and generated from the original data in a separate image production sequence.

        (绘制已缩放的指定图像以适应指定矩形的大小。图像会在此图形上下文坐标空间的指定矩形内绘制，并根据需要进行缩放。透明像素不会影响已经存在的任何像素。在所有情况下，即使整个图像尚未针对当前输出设备进行缩放、抖动和转换，此方法也会立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则drawImage返回false。当更多的图像变得可用时，加载图像的进程通过调用其imageUpdate方法来通知图像观察者。图像的缩放版本不一定仅仅因为已为此输出设备构建了图像的未缩放版本而立即可用。每个尺寸的图像可以单独缓存并在单独的图像制作序列中从原始数据生成。)
        Specified by:
        drawImage in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的绘制图像)
        Parameters:
        img - the specified image to be drawn. This method does nothing if img is null.(IMG -要绘制的指定图像。如果IMG为空，此方法不执行任何操作。)
        x - the x coordinate.(x -x坐标。)
        y - the y coordinate.(y -y坐标。)
        width - the width of the rectangle.(宽度-矩形的宽度。)
        height - the height of the rectangle.(高度-矩形的高度。)
        observer - object to be notified as more of the image is converted.(观察者-随着更多图像被转换而通知的对象。)
        Returns:
        false if the image pixels are still changing; true otherwise.(如果图像像素仍在变化，则为假;否则为真。)
        See Also:
        Image, ImageObserver, ImageObserver.imageUpdate(java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, int)

      • setXORMode

        @NotImplemented
public void setXORMode(java.awt.Color c1)
        Sets the paint mode of this graphics context to alternate between this graphics context's current color and the new specified color. This specifies that logical pixel operations are performed in the XOR mode, which alternates pixels between the current color and a specified XOR color.

        When drawing operations are performed, pixels which are the current color are changed to the specified color, and vice versa.

        Pixels that are of colors other than those two colors are changed in an unpredictable but reversible manner; if the same figure is drawn twice, then all pixels are restored to their original values.

        (将此图形上下文的绘制模式设置为在此图形上下文的当前颜色和新指定颜色之间交替。这指定逻辑像素操作在异或模式下执行，该模式在当前颜色和指定的异或颜色之间交替像素。执行绘制操作时，当前颜色的像素将更改为指定颜色，反之亦然。这两种颜色以外的颜色的像素会以不可预测但可逆的方式发生变化;如果同一图形绘制了两次，则所有像素都会恢复为其原始值。)
        Specified by:
        setXORMode in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的setXORMode)
        Parameters:
        c1 - the XOR alternation color(c1 -异或交替颜色)

      • setPaintMode

        @NotImplemented
public void setPaintMode()
        Sets the paint mode of this graphics context to overwrite the destination with this graphics context's current color. This sets the logical pixel operation function to the paint or overwrite mode. All subsequent rendering operations will overwrite the destination with the current color.(设置此图形上下文的绘制模式以使用此图形上下文的当前颜色覆盖目标。这将逻辑像素操作功能设置为绘制或重写模式。所有后续渲染操作都将用当前颜色覆盖目标。)
        Specified by:
        setPaintMode in class java.awt.Graphics(java.awt.GMA类中的setPaintMode)

      • drawRenderedImage

        @NotImplemented
public void drawRenderedImage(java.awt.image.RenderedImage img,
                                              java.awt.geom.AffineTransform xform)
        Renders a RenderableImage, applying a transform from image space into user space before drawing. The transformation from user space into device space is done with the current Transform in the Graphics2D. The specified transformation is applied to the image before the transform attribute in the Graphics2D context is applied. The rendering attributes applied include the Clip, Transform, and Composite attributes. Note that no rendering is done if the specified transform is noninvertible.

        Rendering hints set on the Graphics2D object might be used in rendering the RenderableImage. If explicit control is required over specific hints recognized by a specific RenderableImage, or if knowledge of which hints are used is required, then a RenderedImage should be obtained directly from the RenderableImage and rendered using drawRenderedImage.

        (呈现RenderableImage，在绘制之前应用从图像空间到用户空间的变换。从用户空间到设备空间的转换是使用Graphics 2D中的当前Change完成的。在应用Graphics2D上下文中的变换属性之前，指定的变换将应用于图像。应用的渲染属性包括剪辑、变换和合成属性。请注意，如果指定的变换不可逆，则不会进行渲染。在Graphics2D对象上设置的呈现提示可能用于呈现RenderableImage。如果需要对特定RenderableImage识别的特定提示进行显式控制，或者如果需要了解使用哪些提示，则应直接从RenderableImage获取RenderedImage，并使用drawRenderedImage进行渲染。)
        Specified by:
        drawRenderedImage in class java.awt.Graphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D类中的drawRenderedImage)
        Parameters:
        img - the image to be rendered. This method does nothing if img is null.(img -要渲染的图像。如果IMG为空，此方法不执行任何操作。)
        xform - the transformation from image space into user space(xform -从图像空间到用户空间的转换)
        See Also:
        _transform, setTransform(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), setComposite(java.awt.Composite), clip(java.awt.Shape), setClip(java.awt.Shape), drawRenderedImage(java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform)

      • drawRenderableImage

        @NotImplemented
public void drawRenderableImage(java.awt.image.renderable.RenderableImage img,
                                                java.awt.geom.AffineTransform xform)
        Renders a RenderedImage, applying a transform from image space into user space before drawing. Note that no rendering is done if the specified transform is noninvertible.(呈现RenderedImage，在绘制之前应用从图像空间到用户空间的变换。从用户空间到设备空间的转换是使用Graphics 2D中的当前Change完成的。在应用Graphics2D上下文中的变换属性之前，指定的变换将应用于图像。应用的渲染属性包括剪辑、变换和合成属性。请注意，如果指定的变换不可逆，则不会进行渲染。)
